name: @synonymdev/slashtags-accounts
description: Create website accounts or log in with bitcoin keypair
author: Nazeh <ar.nazeh@gmail.com>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist types && ipjs build && tsc && mv types/packages/accounts/src dist/types
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test && dependency-check dist --no-dev
